name: Basharat Zahor
story: Majeed Fahim was born in Iran and enlisted in the military at a young age. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional marksmanship skills and dedication to his country. After several successful missions, he was assigned to the OPFOR unit in Arma 3 as a Heavy Gunner. Despite his quiet demeanor, his fellow soldiers know him as a reliable and skilled member of the team.
